著.definition: to make known; to show; to prove; to write; book; outstanding

著作.definition: to write; literary work; book; article; writings; CL:部[bu4]

著力.definition: to put effort into sth; to try really hard

著勁.definition: to put effort into sth; to try really hard

著勁兒.definition: to put effort into sth; to try really hard

著呢.definition: comes at the end of the sentence to indicate a strong degree; quite; rather

著地.definition: to land; to touch the ground; also pr. [zhuo2 di4]

著床.definition: to lie down on a bed; (physiology) implantation (attachment of a blastocyst to the lining of the uterus); (of an oyster larva) to attach to a substrate; (fig.) to take root; to become established

著忙.definition: to rush; in a hurry; to worry about being late

著急.definition: to worry; to feel anxious; to feel a sense of urgency; to be in a hurry; Taiwan pr. [zhao1ji2]

著想.definition: to give thought (to others); to consider (other people's needs); also pr. [zhao2 xiang3]

著手.definition: to put one's hand to it; to start out on a task; to set out

著手成春.definition: lit. set out and it becomes spring (idiom); to effect a miracle cure (of medical operation); to bring back the dead; once it starts, everything goes well

著數.definition: move (in chess, on stage, in martial arts); gambit; trick; scheme; movement; same as 招數|招数[zhao1 shu4]

著書立說.definition: to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)

著涼.definition: to catch cold; Taiwan pr. [zhao1 liang2]

著眼.definition: to have one's eyes on (a goal); having sth in mind; to concentrate

著眼點.definition: place of interest; a place one has one's eye on

著緊.definition: urgent; in a great hurry; in intimate relationship with sb

著色.definition: to apply color; to color; to paint

著花.definition: to blossom; see 著花|着花[zhao2 hua1]

著落.definition: whereabouts; place to settle; reliable source (of funds etc); (of responsibility for a matter) to rest with sb; settlement; solution

著著失敗.definition: (idiom) to fail at every step of the way; Taiwan pr. [zhuo2zhuo2shi1bai4]

著迷.definition: to be fascinated; to be captivated

著道兒.definition: to be fooled; to be taken in (by a ruse)

著邊.definition: relevant; to the point; has sth to do with the matter (also used with negative)

著邊兒.definition: erhua variant of 著邊|着边[zhao2 bian1]

著重.definition: to put emphasis on; to stress

著重號.definition: Chinese underdot (punct. used for emphasis, sim. to Western italics)

著錄.definition: to record; to put down in writing

著陸.definition: landing; touchdown; to land; to touch down

著魔.definition: obsessed; bewitched; enchanted; as if possessed
